name: Pichu
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.

attacks.name: Zzzap
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to each Pokémon in play that has a Pokémon Power. Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance.

rule_box: If this Baby Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and your opponent tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything required in order to use that attack). If tails, your opponent’s turn ends without an attack.
